column5: Ok I was really curious as to why this had such outrageously good reviews. I bought it and thought it was a nightmare to use and it did absolutely nothing good for my skin. Thank you for posting this!

Oh my god. The arm from under the fridge gave me chills. 

My dude have you thought of moving?

Retinoids daily? Lmao nah. 

Also exfoliation 3x weekly is way too much.
This man is abusive. I know in your update you said y‚Äôall aren‚Äôt breaking up but that‚Äôs a huge mistake. This isn‚Äôt healthy or normal, and he‚Äôll do it again.

Every time I see a post like this I am suspicious it‚Äôs another one of those troll posts from that guy. 

If it‚Äôs not, I‚Äôm sorry you‚Äôre going through this. I would sit down and talk with him and tell him why you‚Äôre uncomfortable, especially because he crossed a boundary he agreed to with you. 

Good luck!

Why do men date women with small breasts if they dislike small breasts? Men like this disgust me. He‚Äôs not even a man. He‚Äôs a little boy. 

At 30 years old he should know better. Find someone else who respects and values you and your body just the way it is. 

Best of luck ‚ù§Ô∏è
My ex did this to me too after I was just broken up with. Swooped in right when I was vulnerable. I hate guys like this. So predatory. I‚Äôm glad you got away from the guy who did that to you too.
Wouldn‚Äôt it at least remain visible to those who are already subscribed? Not sure how it works.
What happened in this guy‚Äôs life that he‚Äôs this broken inside and feels the need to go after strangers on the internet? Big yikes.
You‚Äôre gross. Who asks someone that question?

I swear some of the stories I see from women on here about the shit their boyfriends say to them makes me wonder who raised these assholes. 

Girl, there are men out there who would never dream of saying anything like that, or even think it. I know because I am dating one. 

I used to be with a man who disrespected my body, especially my boobs, constantly, so I know what it‚Äôs like. 

Dump him. I know that seems like it‚Äôd be an overreaction but it‚Äôs not. YOU CAN DO BETTER.

Now that I‚Äôm with someone who not only respects but loves and adores and compliments my body, I wondered why I stayed so long with a douchebag who didn‚Äôt. 

Best of luck ‚ù§Ô∏è

Legit. Who says that to their girlfriend?! OP, don‚Äôt be with someone who fuels or gives you body issues. 

I made that mistake for 4 years and I wish I had learned my lesson sooner. 

A man who appreciates your body INCLUDING your small boobs (not in spite of) does exist. 

It ain‚Äôt this guy. 

Raise the standards for yourself.

Why are you still with him? What kind of man child says that to their girlfriend?

You should tell him for a guy with a small penis, he‚Äôs pretty hot.

Men really don‚Äôt think before they speak sometimes do they? 

I would have taken his comment the same way, but I suggest communicating with him about how it made you feel.

I don‚Äôt think you overreacted. I‚Äôm sure if you made a similar joke about him having a small penis he wouldn‚Äôt think it was funny.

I‚Äôm sorry he said that to you.

You‚Äôre 18?! Oh my god you‚Äôre so young. I am 28 and I tolerated too many shitty men for too long. I said in a comment below but I‚Äôll say it again: this is not normal. My current boyfriend had never shared his ‚Äúfuck list‚Äù with me. Or treated my boobs like a consolation prize. 

You deserve so much better. I know you insist he‚Äôs great and loving but everything you‚Äôve typed here indicates the opposite.

Are you dating my ex? Seriously. This is the type of shit he said and it DESTROYED my self esteem the entire four years we dated. I still get triggered to this day when big boobs are mentioned by anyone. I only wish our relationship ended sooner.

Now I‚Äôm with a guy who loves my boobs the way they are.

Please dump this clown. He sounds like an awful boyfriend. This is NOT healthy or normal.

If you‚Äôre fine with being second place for the entire relationship until he eventually leaves you for her, then continue dating him. 

If not, I think you would be better off finding someone who‚Äôs love you don‚Äôt have to fight for. 

Best of luck to you! You deserve better!

I don‚Äôt have any advice but you‚Äôre not alone. I feel triggered by so many shows because there are so many that talk about big boobs or have cast members with big boobs. 

It just makes me so sad. It‚Äôs obvious society has a preference.
Looks gorgeous! You‚Äôre rocking it!

I can relate. I‚Äôm 28 now, brown curly hair and small boobs and I can‚Äôt gain weight. I struggle with the comparison to big breasted blondes all the time. I never HATED my small boobs until my ex, who made various comments about my breasts and about big boobed blondes. He constantly compared me.

Now, I‚Äôm with a man who worships my body. I still get triggered by certain things (I can‚Äôt even look at Kate Upton and when I try on low cut shirts I want to cry) but he loves me for ME.

I know comments from one shitty person may last a long time, possibly a life time. But you are so young. I promise you that one day you will find a man who loves you EXACTLY as you are.

It‚Äôs hard to believe my boyfriend loves me the way I am but I‚Äôm working on it. You are a work in progress, you‚Äôre only 17. 

For now, try to turn your love inward. Try to build yourself up. You have so many years to grow and change in life that your confidence will grow the happier you are with yourself as a person. Find little things about you that you like. Embrace your features that you like.

In a society that objectifies women constantly it‚Äôs hard not to place so much importance on our looks.

But I promise you one day you‚Äôll find someone who wouldn‚Äôt have you any other way. 

Best üíñ
Thank you üíï

In the same boat on everything I tried. Sounds like a dermatologist is the next stop!

Thank you for that, trying to believe it! ü•∫üòÖ especially with summer coming I want to not be so covered up!

Thank you!
I want to but I always worry it‚Äôll be so expensive. But I guess with all the products I‚Äôve tried it‚Äôs adding up anyway üòï
Agreed. I can‚Äôt believe what I‚Äôm reading. I‚Äôm hoping this is a troll.

Seriously. His willingness to disregard his wife and believe a complete stranger AND think his wife going to counseling means she‚Äôs the mentally ill one is so bananas to me. Also as if mental illness automatically means someone is abusive. Give me a break.

That guy sounds like an asshole. That is not reflective of guys as a whole. I‚Äôm a small boobed girl here but only a real piece of crap would talk like that about their significant other and then to another woman about her body. I hope your boyfriend spoke up.

I know exactly where you‚Äôre coming from. When people show me celebrities with small boobs and say ‚Äúsee?! She has small boobs and men love her!‚Äù I always think well yeah because every other part of her is perfect?

I think I have an ugly face so of course I get even more hung up on my boobs.

I don‚Äôt have anything reassuring to say but just know you are not alone! Hang in there! I‚Äôm sure you are lovable and beautiful.

Girl, love yourself. 

Love yourself more than this man loves you. And the thing is, he doesn‚Äôt. He sounds like a shallow control freak. 

Please dump him and never look back. This is not normal.

Thank you for this, you encompassed it perfectly. That is exactly how it feels, like it‚Äôs my job to teach them a lesson but in the end it‚Äôs not worth the anger or the risk of physical harm to myself or others.
Thank you!!! ü§ó
I pick at the scabs of my old zits. It gives me so many scars and then I feel so insecure :(
Thank you so much! I‚Äôm usually on here in mobile so I didn‚Äôt see the PDFs so thank you! I‚Äôll check the beginners guide. I‚Äôm glad to hear that you found it easy to get the hang of!

Looks amazing! I also have colored hair and my curls are so dry and frizzy. I just learned about the existence of the ‚Äúcurly girl method‚Äù from this sub and I‚Äôm overwhelmed. It seems like it‚Äôs expensive and overwhelming to transition. Any words of advice?

You are beautiful btw!
I just think it‚Äôs super weird to send and receive pics of your sibling giving oral sex ü§¢
Am I the only one who suspects she saved them on purpose for this eventual situation? ü§î I think ESH.
It‚Äôs pretty much people trying to look hot and get upvotes for it. Not at all about makeup. Totally sucks and ruins the point of the sub.
He‚Äôs already cheating on you with her. I guarantee it. He doesn‚Äôt even respect you (who says ‚Äúshe‚Äôs too good for me‚Äù about another girl to his girlfriend?!) Throw the whole man away.

If I‚Äôm being honest, I‚Äôd be extremely disappointed. I believe an engagement ring is something that should last a lifetime or be passed down through family. If this were me, I would not consider this engagement ring material. But it‚Äôs about what YOU like.

I was in your shoes and it‚Äôs been a long process to unlearn those behavior patterns (I‚Äôm still working on it!). Do you have a therapist? If not, I suggest finding a therapist who specializing in DBT (Dialectical Behavioral Therapy). DBT can be useful in treating BPD, mood disorders, suicidal ideation, and for change in behavioral patterns such as self-harm, and substance abuse.

DBT has been life changing for me. It‚Äôs a painful process to reprogram my behaviors but individuals with BPD and individuals with only some indicators of BPD (I‚Äôm the latter) have had success with it. 

If you can‚Äôt afford or don‚Äôt have access to therapy, there are a ton of DBT resources and workbooks available online. I also recommend the podcast ‚ÄúThe Skillful Podcast‚Äù which specializes in DBT. 

Hang in there, it can and will get better. The good news is that with time and work, you can get better. You‚Äôre not alone!

Best wishes.
I feel the same way. I wonder if it ever gets better. I try to fight it but I get tired of fighting myself every damn day. Hang in there, you are not alone.

You did it. You put it exactly into words. Yes absolutely :(

It‚Äôs a living hell.

Ultimately, only you and your boyfriend know if you guys are right for each other. I‚Äôm just a stranger on the internet. 

When my ex boyfriend made degrading comments at the beginning of our relationship about my small breasts, I thought about it every single time we had sex throughout our 4 year relationship. I couldn‚Äôt unhear his comments. 

Do we all have preferences? Of course. But I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs fair to tell your significant other when it can/will hurt them. Especially when it comes to sexual satisfaction. 

I love thick, beautiful hair on a man. My current boyfriend is balding. But does it make me less attracted to him? Fuck no! Our sex life is amazing. I think he‚Äôs perfect the way he is. And I have never thought ‚Äúyeah not having a ton of hair to grab on to really takes away from our sex‚Äù because it doesn‚Äôt. 

I don‚Äôt know how a man his age feels like tits and ass will give him ‚Äúmore to do‚Äù during sex. That seems very immature to me. I also feel like his comments hurt you and affected your self esteem. You can‚Äôt unring that bell, I‚Äôm afraid. 

I‚Äôm just giving you my two cents. Again, I‚Äôm just a random stranger who‚Äôs been through something kind of similar. Now, being with a man who loves my breasts, I‚Äôm bummed my relationship with my ex didn‚Äôt end sooner. Having sex with my current boyfriend who loves my body and who doesn't make me question things beyond my control has been more fulfilling for me. 

The choice is yours. Is this a dealbreaker for you? Can you move past it? Only you know the answer :) I‚Äôm here to talk if you want. Wishing you all the best either way!

ETA: can he cut back on his drinking and see if that makes a difference?

Oh I‚Äôve never heard of that podcast. I‚Äôll give it a listen :)

Thank you and best of luck to you in your journey ‚ù§Ô∏è
I have a DBT workbook but I wish I could find an affordable DBT group üôÅ
You get it üôèüèª Thank you.

It‚Äôs as simple as this: if he can‚Äôt stay hard during sex because of what he thinks of her body, that‚Äôs not a relationship that‚Äôs going to last. It would be entirely different if he was able to maintain an erection despite what he views as not his ideal body type. It‚Äôs clearly unattractive enough to him to damage their sex life. 

I never said he was a bad person. But they should be with people who they are sexually compatible with. I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs wildly controversial.
Then he should‚Äôve broken up with her instead of degrading her body and crushing her self esteem.
I agree, one of many reasons he‚Äôs my ex üòÇ
Lol what? How did you gather that from my comment?

My ex-boyfriend was a big boobs guy. I have B/small C‚Äôs. He would never touch them and never liked them at all. I loved my boobs until I met him. It messed me up for years. 

We broke up a couple of years ago. My  current boyfriend will constantly compliment my boobs (completely unprompted). I never even told him about my insecurity. 

The moral of the story is if he doesn‚Äôt love your body the way it is, you can and will find someone who does. 

You are too young and smart to be with someone like this. There IS better out there for you. 

Good luck!

They say when you have a motorcycle it‚Äôs not ‚Äúif‚Äù you‚Äôll dump your bike, but ‚Äúwhen‚Äù - in broad daylight, while wearing a helmet, and in perfect road conditions, my ex boyfriend slammed into a tree, shattered his left arm,  burst a kidney and his spleen. He still can‚Äôt lift his left arm above his stomach height to this day. 

All I‚Äôm saying is your girlfriend has every right to worry. Motorcycles are inherently dangerous. Take care of yourself out there.
Throw the whole man away.
Never thought I‚Äôd see someone with the same trigger. You‚Äôre not alone. I too have trouble with this.
YIKES. You are beyond help.

You are being completely controlling and possessive of your (probably now ex) wife. This guy isn‚Äôt an ex, he is her DEAD husband. You never ‚Äúput that behind‚Äù you. It‚Äôs a tremendous loss. To ask that of her is frankly messed up. The grief was part of the package when you married her. If you can‚Äôt handle that, you should never have been with her in the first place.
You sound abusive and honestly terrifying. For her sake I hope she never comes back. Get some therapy and leave her alone.
In the exact same boat!

I agree. It‚Äôs like I only have energy for one thing a day. During the week it‚Äôs work. I really want to work on my hobbies, but the one I‚Äôm most passionate about requires a lot of thinking and time dedication. By the end of the day, I can‚Äôt muster it. So I just end up scrolling through my phone.

I hate to suggest this OP, but is there a chance this sexual injury occurred during an assault, or has he been assaulted in the past? 

I just find it odd he hasn‚Äôt done whatever he can to fix it. Sorry you‚Äôre going through this.

If it was just the physical issue maybe you could work on it, but then you mentioned he finds aspects of your personality (quirkiness, nerdiness, tomboyishness) unattractive? That‚Äôs ridiculous and not fair to you.

There is a man out there who can and will love you for you. Your boyfriend is not him.
Yes good call! Thank you for correcting me!

It‚Äôs so dumb also because sometimes your skin purges when you start a new routine, causing a breakout. If you wait a week sometimes it goes away. And if it isn‚Äôt compatible with your skin, it doesn‚Äôt make it a bad product. The preaching that goes on at SCA drives me insane.
Me everyday. You‚Äôre not alone.
He‚Äôs cheated before, he‚Äôs clearly cheating again.
Omg this is me!!!! If someone doesn‚Äôt say ‚Äúyes absolutely‚Äù I feel bad.

I feel the same way. I‚Äôm away from by boyfriend for a few days and I feel like he‚Äôs just going to fall out of love with me and break up with me when I get back. 

I keep overanalyzing all his texts looking for signs he‚Äôs stopped loving me.

Yep. Whenever my boyfriend takes even just 30 extra minutes past his normal time to respond, I assume he‚Äôs sick of me. I‚Äôll analyze each emoji and period. 

A few days ago he didn‚Äôt text me for 6 hours (we usually go 2-4) and I assumed he was just annoyed with me. He was sick (which I knew) and had been napping, but of course I assumed the worst.

When I saw him a few hours later, he told me he had been thinking a lot about me while he was resting and how grateful he was for me since I had been there for him the last couple days when he was sick. 

Just goes to show how much our brains lie to us.

Yet even when I‚Äôm proven wrong, that voice in my head doubting it gets louder.
Yup. This is me every day. I worry either I‚Äôll ruin it or I worry that the universe will realize I don‚Äôt deserve happiness and something bad will happen.
DAE feel like your pain is a burden to everyone else so you either need to pretend you‚Äôre not hurting or pull away from everyone?
Yee-aww ‚òπÔ∏è
It‚Äôs going to be ok I am so sorry you are in pain. This moment will pass, hang in there.
I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs weird at all, I think it‚Äôs very sweet. Your caption sounds great and it sounds like you had a nice time with her :)

She would but only because she likes control. In her dream world I would be sick and need her. She has Munchausens and Munchausens by proxy and carted me in and out of hospitals my entire childhood. She also lied about having MS and Parkinson‚Äôs for years.
I guess I mean morally. As much as she‚Äôs emotionally abused me and so many others, I still feel immense guilt for not doing more.
I know :( you have your defenses up immediately.

That is a huge step! I have a tendency to do that myself. Seeing the pattern is half the battle :) once you see the pattern it‚Äôs easier to unlearn those habits. I‚Äôm working on it myself. It‚Äôs a tough journey that does get easier over time.
